StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: INSERTTECHNICIAN
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.INSERTTECHNICIAN(pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pIdBuilding IN VARCHAR2, numberOffice IN VARCHAR2, staffType IN VARCHAR2, &lt;br/&gt;techTitle IN VARCHAR2, techSkill IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; INSERT INTO Technician_table &lt;br/&gt; VALUES(Technician_obj(sequenceTutorStaffID.Nextval, pSurname, pFirstName, pTitle, pAddress, pPhone, pPostcode, &lt;br/&gt; pCampusLocation, pIdBuilding, numberOffice, staffType, techTitle, techSkill));&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END insertTechnician;
